author.bio:

guild.description:
Humor, irony, exaggeration, or ridicule to expose and criticize people's stupidity or vices, particularly in the context of contemporary politics and other topical issues.

Satire sites
- https://babylonbee.com

- https://thegloriousamerican.com/
- https://www.thebeaverton.com/
- https://www.sanguinepenguin.net/
- https://waterfordwhispersnews.com/

guild.name: satire

title: Media Criticizes Trump For Downplaying Virus Threat By Not Dying | The Babylon Bee

body: So true!!  My gosh, they were calling him old and obese, and it seemed like they were literally expecting him to die from this.
body_html: So true!! My gosh, they were calling him old and obese, and it seemed like they were literally expecting him to die from this.
